title: Credit on UPI touched â‚¹10,000 crore, says NPCI CEO Dilip Asbe
description: Credit card transactions through UPI have hit Rs. 10,000 crore, with Rs. 100-200 crore spent via credit lines, according to NPCI. ICICI Bank leads in disbursing these pre-approved loans. Despite slow growth in credit lines, banks aim to attract new customers by providing small loans against fixed deposits.
